sentences.en: After repeated exhortation by his comrades, he finally straightened out his thinking.
sentences.cn: 经过同志们再三劝导，他终于想通了。

sentences.en: He then signs off with a final exhortation: "Catch the balls."
sentences.cn: 最后他发出了号召：“接球！”

sentences.en: For our exhortation was not of deceit, nor of uncleanness, nor in guile.
sentences.cn: 我们的劝勉，不是出于错误，不是出于污秽，也不是用诡诈。
